Favourite Music Album of 2016

My favourite music releases of 2016 by genre
category: music • created Dec 15th 2016
progress: finished • epistemic state: believed (?)

The espitemic status meta-tag matches the way I personally feel about what I think. It somehow shows my degree of confidence in the content I write. It also allows me to keep track of my beliefs and see how often I change my opinion towards a particular subject.

learn more »

 • difficulty: trivial

This is this time of the year again during which I list my favorite music releases of the year. And 2016's been a good year as for records. From digging deeper in horrorcore and the Memphis rap scene (Bones, Chris Travis, Xavier Wolf, etc.), to reconciling myself with death metal, being astound by the release of an unexpected A Tribe Called Quest tape after the sorrowful death of Phife Dawg. As Nails releases a solid and dark 3-track LP tinted by their most abrasive material, I found myself glad to listen to a dismaying ACxDC and audacious 胡蝶の夢、十の夜's tape. Though I must admit I was hoping a way more enterprising Flatbush Zombies' “3001: A Laced Odyssey” – probably my only delusive arrival.

I look forward to listening Pouya/Fat Nick mixtape that should be put out later in December, which would wind up this year's musical wandering.

Hip-hop, Rap and Trap

  • “We Got It from Here... Thank You 4 Your Service” by A Tribe Called Quest
  • “The Terrible Tales Of Scurvy Jones” by Mr. Yote
  • “4 Your Eyez Only” by J. Cole
  • “Thumbs” by Busdriver
  • “and the Anonymous Nobody...” by De La Soul
  • “Dark Side of the Clouds” by \$uicideboy\$
  • “The 2nd Amendment” by JPEGMAFIA x Freaky
  • “Do What Thou Wilt” by Ab-Soul
  • “"Awaken, My Love!"” by Childish Gambino

Metal, Death Metal and Grindcore

  • “Full Of Hell "Split"” by Nails
  • “Decline” by Vermin Womb
  • “Voices” by Wormrot
  • “The Oracles of Death EP” by ACxDC
  • “Tangle EP” by Trash Talk
  • “Shrines of Paralysis” by ULCERATE
  • “Vessels” by Be'lakor
  • “Laugh Tracks” by Knocked Loose

Punk, Garage, Post-hardore and Ska

  • “Bottomless Pit” by Death Grips
  • “YØU CAN'T KILL US” by HIRS
  • “Nothing Gives” by Slowcoaches
  • “Blackout E.P.” by Memory Loss
  • “That's Cool...in a totally negative and destructive way” by Kill Lincoln
  • “TRANS DAY OF REVENGE” by G.L.O.S.S.
  • “WORRY.” by Jeff Rosenstock

Pop, Indie, New Wave and Japanese-Pop

  • “new alhambra” by elvis depressedly
  • “crocco” by 月面避行
  • “DSU” by Alex G
  • “Gadzooks” by Doctor Ew
  • “"Always Room"” by Diners
  • “let's go” by In Love With A Ghost
  • “Adieu l'enfance LP” by La Féline
  • “Moving Day” by Meiko

Jazz, Fusion and Bebop

  • “Black Focus” Yussef Kamaal
  • “Spiritual Jazz” by Various Artists
  • “胡蝶の夢、十の夜” by audace
  • “Stretch Music” by Christian Scott
  • “Singles” by Sun Ra
  • “The Yard Work Simulator Remixes” by Max Graef & Glenn Astro

R&B, Soul and Motown

  • “Manj” by Joomanji
  • “DP018” by Wah Wah 45s
  • “THE HOMESHAKE TAPE” by HOMESHAKE
  • “blisters” by serpentwithfeet
  • “CIRCA 1993” by Sean C. Johnson
  • “Sticky Icky” by Theo Lawrence
